name: Color Change
short-desc: Changes type to match when hit by a damaging move.
long-desc: Whenever this Pokemon takes damage from a move, the Pokemon's type changes to match the move.  If the Pokemon has two types, both are overridden.  The Pokemon must directly take damage; for example, moves blocked by a  will not trigger this ability, nor will moves that deal damage indirectly, such as .  This ability takes effect on only the last hit of a multiple-hit attack.  In Pokemon Colosseum and XD: Gale of Darkness, this ability does not take effect on Shadow-type moves.
